name: testronaut
help_text:
Usage: testronaut [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                         
 Automated CLI Testing Framework                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                         
╭─ Options ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│ --version             -V            Show version and exit                                                                                                             │
│ --verbose             -v            Enable verbose output                                                                                                             │
│ --log-file                    TEXT  Log to file [default: None]                                                                                                       │
│ --sql-debug                         Enable detailed SQL query logging                                                                                                 │
│ --install-completion                Install completion for the current shell.                                                                                         │
│ --show-completion                   Show completion for the current shell, to copy it or customize the installation.                                                  │
│ --help                              Show this message and exit.                                                                                                       │
╰───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─ Commands ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│ config    Configuration management commands                                                                                                                           │
│ analyze   Analyze CLI tools and generate test plans                                                                                                                   │
│ execute   Execute tests from test plans                                                                                                                               │
│ verify    Verify test results                                                                                                                                         │
│ db        Database management commands                                                                                                                                │
╰───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
description: The `unknown` command is part of the `testronaut` automated CLI testing framework. It provides options for managing the framework's configuration, analyzing CLI tools to generate test plans, and executing tests based on those plans. Key functionalities include enabling verbose output, logging activities, detailed SQL query logging, and shell completion installation. This command facilitates automated testing by allowing users to manage configurations, analyze CLI tools, and execute tests effi...
purpose: The main purpose of the tool 'testronaut' is to provide an automated testing framework for command-line interfaces (CLI). It solves the problem of manually testing CLI tools by automating the process, making it more efficient and less error-prone.
background: Testronaut operates in the context of software testing, specifically focusing on command-line interfaces. It is important to understand how CLI tools work, as well as the basics of automated testing frameworks. Familiarity with shell environments and scripting can also be beneficial.
use_cases: Automating the testing of CLI tools to ensure they function correctly.
Generating test plans for CLI applications to streamline the testing process.
Analyzing existing CLI tools to identify potential issues or areas for improvement.
Logging and debugging SQL queries when testing CLI tools that interact with databases.
testing_considerations: Ensure that the CLI tool being tested is compatible with testronaut's framework.
Consider the shell environment where the tests will be executed, as this can affect the results.
Use the verbose and logging options to capture detailed information about test execution.
Be aware of the SQL debugging feature if the CLI tool interacts with a database, as this can provide valuable insights.
